creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Titles for panels (clockwise): {Yumitori no zu} (Scene of The Conferment of the Championship Bow); {Shitaku beya no zu} (Scene of Dressing Room); {Kido uchi no zu} (Scene of Ringside Room); {Kido O-fuda ?? no zu} (Scene of Accounting Room); {Gyōji beya no zu} (Scene of Referees Room); {Senjō sai te-uchi ni zu} (Scene of Rice Offering Ceremony)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: (Six Scenes of Sumō Wrestling)
